mapper.insert: insert into fkt_category (ID, categoryName, DATEADDED, DELETED, MODIFIED, MODIFIEDBY, NAME, VALIDFROM, VALIDTO, ABSTRACTCATEGORY_PARENT) values (#{ID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{DATEADDED,jdbcType=DATE}, #{DELETED,jdbcType=BIT}, #{MODIFIED,jdbcType=DATE}, #{MODIFIEDBY,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{VALIDFROM,jdbcType=DATE}, #{VALIDTO,jdbcType=DATE}, #{ABSTRACTCATEGORY_PARENT,jdbcType=BIGINT})

update fkt_category
categoryName = #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATEADDED = #{DATEADDED,jdbcType=DATE},
DELETED = #{DELETED,jdbcType=BIT},
MODIFIED = #{MODIFIED,jdbcType=DATE},

ABSTRACTCATEGORY_PARENT = #{ABSTRACTCATEGORY_PARENT,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where ID = #{ID,jdbcType=BIGINT}
